summary: The customer was having issues with Contoso Wireless streaming services and the agent helped them by suggesting an upgrade to a newer model phone that would be more compatible with the streaming services. The customer decided to go with the Samsung Galaxy S10, and the agent offered a promotion of waiving the activation fee and free shipping on the new phone. The customer filled out an online form with their contact information and payment details and the agent will help set up and make sure everything is working properly once the new phone arrives.
